lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: Welcome to the Bake an-- oh. Come in small friend.

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: Hello there. I serve everyone... even quingee.

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: Are you here to buy or trade?

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: Please enjoy yourself. I won't ask where you got the gald from.

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: I'd be happy if you came to buy things again.

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: This has been a good exchange.

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: My daughter, Nora, loves quingees. She would love to say hi to you.

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: Noah? He's a hard worker. A little soft. Gentle. He has his own business.

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: Gale's End is a good town. Strong. I feel good about raising Nora here.

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: Come in and dry off. I have a hot cup of coffee or cocoa for you, if you'd like.

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: It's a beautiful day. Would you like a cake to go with it?

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: It's a touch cloudy. Good weather for a cookie and a cup of coffee.

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: The harsh wind blew you in? Rest a while.

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: Hey, what are you doing here? You should be staying inside!

meeting Quingee for the first time.key: meeting Quingee for the first time

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: Hello little one. You remind me of [[name]], somehow. It is.. nice to meet you? Is this the first time we've met?

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: Small friend, you really do keep coming back here. It makes me happy. Thank you.

after Quingee makes decent progress up t.key: after Quingee makes decent progress up the mountain

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: I heard a rumor you've been climbing Galinn, small friend. It hardly sounds safe.

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: Something looks different about you. More accomplished, somehow. What did you do?

after receiving a gift you like.key: after receiving a gift you like

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: That's a wonderful gift you got there. Nora would love this.

after receiving a gift you don't like.key: after receiving a gift you don't like

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: .. Really?

after receiving a gift you're neutral ab.key: after receiving a gift you're neutral about

lines.name: Reinhardt
lines.text: Thank you for the kind gesture.

lines.name: Nora
lines.text: Oh my Stars, hi! Are you a quingee? Can you talk? Is it true that quingees can speak?

lines.name: Nora
lines.text: You're so cute!! Can I give you a hug? Do you want a snackie? Are you a good quingee?

lines.name: Nora
lines.text: Can we play? Please? Pleaaasee? Pretty please with a cherry on top?

lines.name: Nora
lines.text: Do you see my hat? It looks like a quingee, just like you!

lines.name: Nora
lines.text: It's my favoritist quingee ever, [[name]]-quingee! Papa, papa, look!

lines.name: Nora
lines.text: Do you like cake? I love chocolate cake!

lines.name: Nora
lines.text: Coffee is too bitter for me, yuck. Do you like coffee?

lines.name: Nora
lines.text: SCRAAAAAAAAA! ...Hehe!

lines.name: Nora
lines.text: Buy one hug now and get two free! And, and, maybe even a cookie!

lines.name: Nora
lines.text: Please enjoy yourself [[name]]-quingee! My papa makes the best sweets.
